duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft architectural designs and blueprints for sustainable and environmentally friendly buildings.
Conduct research on sustainability practices and provide consulting services to clients and project teams.
Continuously learn and stay updated on the latest architectural and environmental design trends and practices.
Collaborate with team members to develop innovative solutions for reducing carbon emissions through architecture and design.
Advocate for climate justice and incorporate it into architectural and design projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Architecture, Environmental Design, or a related field (Master's preferred)
